Posts.EditableText:
Create a new game.  When at the "Add Rooms" window:

Create two room names.  Check the second room, then delete it.  Check the first room.
Posts.HTML:
Create a new game. When at the "Add Rooms" window:

Create two room names. Check the second room, then delete it. Check the first room.
